lead_paragraph: Lawmakers repeatedly questioned the wisdom and effectiveness of Start-Up New York, one of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s signature initiatives.

headline.print_headline: Official Defends Effort That Has Created Only 408 Jobs
headline.main: Official Defends Cuomo Program That Has Created Only 408 Jobs

snippet: Lawmakers repeatedly questioned the wisdom and effectiveness of Start-Up New York, one of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s signature initiatives....
abstract: Howard Zemsky, chief executive of Empire State Development, defends jobs creation program Start-Up New York to lawmakers during off-session hearing in Albany, despite fact that effort only helped to create 408 jobs since its inception in 2013; lawmakers remain unimpressed, with some saying initiative needs serious 'rethinking.'
